Articles.Content: An action group to automatically rise the thrust limiter would be very helpful since some of my rockets that burn with SRBs in the first stage will have a TWR less than 1.0 when the SRBs are jettisoned, if I keep the main engine thrust limiter enabled. And it all happens too quick to right-click during flight.

Do you think about something like this?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/90802-Hierarchic-order-of-command-modules?p=1355086#post1355086
What does that have to do with this?
